messages.message: Starting off with some solid production on that 6-8-11. Good luck everyone!
I'm going to branch out toward the center. That Brick 10 looks like a nice target for later!
Nice spot, Alice! That 6-8-11 is definitely hard to pass up. I think I'll settle in down south at Node 42 and see if I can't get some of that Ore and Wheat production going. Good luck to both of you!
Going to head towards the coast for now. That Ore and Wheat is a nice start, but I'll definitely need some more variety soon!

Hey Alice and Bob! Those are some great spots you've picked. Alice, that 6-8-11 is a powerhouse, and Bob, that double Wheat 9 with Ore is going to make for some fast cities! I think I'll grab some of this Wood and Brick production up north and see if I can keep pace with you two. Good luck!
Pointing my road towards the center! I'm looking to build a nice little network up here and hopefully snag some more of that good production.
